featured.text: However, they cannot 20 the personal attention coming from the distinctive tap of a pea shooter.
Sometimes, people pick foreign names for their children because those names are unusual and will thus make their children more 39 and distinctive.
One of the most distinctive features of the kilt is the pattern of squares, or sett, it exhibits.

definition.zh_def: 獨特的，具有明顯特徵的
definition.en_def: Having a quality or characteristic that makes something different from others.
definition.example: Her distinctive style of painting sets her apart from other artists.
